name: Yaktrax SkiTrax - Unisex
description: Get to the lift line without slipping or adding wear to your boots' sole by using this slip-on sole protector.Compatible with all alpine ski boots.Tread shape prevent snow build-up.Heel tab makes for an easy installation and removal.Carry bag included.X-Small fits Mondo size 21-23.5, Small fits 24-27, Medium fits 27.5-29.5, Large fits 30-31.5 and X-Large fits 32+.
